overview: Based on characters from 19th-century Chinese novel The Seven Heroes and Five Gallants.  Zhan Zhao, the South Hero, was granted the title Lord Cat by Emperor Renzong. Wu Yi, known as  Five Rats of the Sky Island was disappointed to hear this. Bai Yutang, the fifth brocade mouse, was extremely furious.  He swore to compete with Zhan Zhao. The Fire Immortal of the East Capital is offering ceremony to show the country's peace and prosperity. The Fire Immortal Statue is granted to pray for the world. His Majesty ordered Zhan Zhao to protect it. When Bai Yutang heard about this, he attempted to steal the Fire Immortal Statue for the dignity of the Five Rats. The brothers came one after another, but they accidentally got involved into  a mysterious revenge case.
title: The Invincible Constable
